verses.text_plain: Thou also, son of man, take thee a tile, and lay it before thee, and pourtray upon it the city, even Jerusalem:
verses.verse_html: 1Thou also, son of man, take thee a tile, and lay it before thee, and pourtray upon it the city, even Jerusalem:

verses.text_plain: And lay siege against it, and build a fort against it, and cast a mount against it; set the camp also against it, and set battering rams against it round about.
verses.verse_html:
2And lay siege against it, and build a fort against it, and cast a mount against it; set the camp also against it, and set battering rams against it round about. ▼
▼ battering…: chief leaders

verses.text_plain: Moreover take thou unto thee an iron pan, and set it for a wall of iron between thee and the city: and set thy face against it, and it shall be besieged, and thou shalt lay siege against it. This shall be a sign to the house of Israel.
verses.verse_html:
3Moreover take thou unto thee an iron pan, and set it for a wall of iron between thee and the city: and set thy face against it, and it shall be besieged, and thou shalt lay siege against it. This shall be a sign to the house of Israel. ▼
▼ an…: or, a flat plate, or, slice

tokens.text: against it, and it shall be besieged

footnotes.body_text: ▼ an…: or, a flat plate, or, slice
footnotes.body_html: ▼ an…: or, a flat plate, or, slice

verses.text_plain: Lie thou also upon thy left side, and lay the iniquity of the house of Israel upon it: according to the number of the days that thou shalt lie upon it thou shalt bear their iniquity.
verses.verse_html: 4Lie thou also upon thy left side, and lay the iniquity of the house of Israel upon it: according to the number of the days that thou shalt lie upon it thou shalt bear their iniquity.

verses.text_plain: For I have laid upon thee the years of their iniquity, according to the number of the days, three hundred and ninety days: so shalt thou bear the iniquity of the house of Israel.
verses.verse_html: 5For I have laid upon thee the years of their iniquity, according to the number of the days, three hundred and ninety days: so shalt thou bear the iniquity of the house of Israel.

verses.text_plain: And when thou hast accomplished them, lie again on thy right side, and thou shalt bear the iniquity of the house of Judah forty days: I have appointed thee each day for a year.
verses.verse_html:
6And when thou hast accomplished them, lie again on thy right side, and thou shalt bear the iniquity of the house of Judah forty days: I have appointed thee each day for a year. ▼
▼ each…: Heb. a day for a year, a day for a year

footnotes.body_text: ▼ each…: Heb. a day for a year, a day for a year
footnotes.body_html: ▼ each…: Heb. a day for a year, a day for a year

verses.text_plain: Therefore thou shalt set thy face toward the siege of Jerusalem, and thine arm shall be uncovered, and thou shalt prophesy against it.
verses.verse_html: 7Therefore thou shalt set thy face toward the siege of Jerusalem, and thine arm shall be uncovered, and thou shalt prophesy against it.

verses.text_plain: And, behold, I will lay bands upon thee, and thou shalt not turn thee from one side to another, till thou hast ended the days of thy siege.
verses.verse_html:
8And, behold, I will lay bands upon thee, and thou shalt not turn thee from one side to another, till thou hast ended the days of thy siege. ▼
▼ from one…: Heb. from thy side to thy side

tokens.text: upon thee, and thou shalt not turn

footnotes.body_text: ▼ from one…: Heb. from thy side to thy side
footnotes.body_html: ▼ from one…: Heb. from thy side to thy side

verses.text_plain: Take thou also unto thee wheat, and barley, and beans, and lentiles, and millet, and fitches, and put them in one vessel, and make thee bread thereof, according to the number of the days that thou shalt lie upon thy side, three hundred and ninety days shalt thou eat thereof.
verses.verse_html:
9Take thou also unto thee wheat, and barley, and beans, and lentiles, and millet, and fitches, and put them in one vessel, and make thee bread thereof, according to the number of the days that thou shalt lie upon thy side, three hundred and ninety days shalt thou eat thereof. ▼
▼ fitches: or, spelt

verses.text_plain: And thy meat which thou shalt eat shall be by weight, twenty shekels a day: from time to time shalt thou eat it.
verses.verse_html: 10And thy meat which thou shalt eat shall be by weight, twenty shekels a day: from time to time shalt thou eat it.

verses.text_plain: Thou shalt drink also water by measure, the sixth part of an hin: from time to time shalt thou drink.
verses.verse_html: 11Thou shalt drink also water by measure, the sixth part of an hin: from time to time shalt thou drink.

verses.text_plain: And thou shalt eat it as barley cakes, and thou shalt bake it with dung that cometh out of man, in their sight.
verses.verse_html: 12And thou shalt eat it as barley cakes, and thou shalt bake it with dung that cometh out of man, in their sight.

verses.text_plain: And the Lord said, Even thus shall the children of Israel eat their defiled bread among the Gentiles, whither I will drive them.
verses.verse_html: 13And the Lord said, Even thus shall the children of Israel eat their defiled bread among the Gentiles, whither I will drive them.

verses.text_plain: Then said I, Ah Lord God! behold, my soul hath not been polluted: for from my youth up even till now have I not eaten of that which dieth of itself, or is torn in pieces; neither came there abominable flesh into my mouth.
verses.verse_html: 14Then said I, Ah Lord God! behold, my soul hath not been polluted: for from my youth up even till now have I not eaten of that which dieth of itself, or is torn in pieces; neither came there abominable flesh into my mouth.

tokens.text: up even till now have I not eaten
of that which dieth of itself

verses.text_plain: Then he said unto me, Lo, I have given thee cow’s dung for man’s dung, and thou shalt prepare thy bread therewith.
verses.verse_html: 15Then he said unto me, Lo, I have given thee cow’s dung for man’s dung, and thou shalt prepare thy bread therewith.

verses.text_plain: Moreover he said unto me, Son of man, behold, I will break the staff of bread in Jerusalem: and they shall eat bread by weight, and with care; and they shall drink water by measure, and with astonishment:
verses.verse_html: 16Moreover he said unto me, Son of man, behold, I will break the staff of bread in Jerusalem: and they shall eat bread by weight, and with care; and they shall drink water by measure, and with astonishment:

verses.text_plain: That they may want bread and water, and be astonied one with another, and consume away for their iniquity.
verses.verse_html: 17That they may want bread and water, and be astonied one with another, and consume away for their iniquity.
